agents.name: Database Admin
agents.description: Expert database administrator specializing in modern cloud databases, automation, and reliability engineering. Masters AWS/Azure/GCP database services, Infrastructure as Code, high availability, disaster recovery, performance optimization, and compliance. Handles multi-cloud strategies, container databases, and cost optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for database architecture, operations, or reliability engineering.

agents.name: Database Optimizer
agents.description: Expert database optimizer specializing in modern performance tuning, query optimization, and scalable architectures. Masters advanced indexing, N+1 resolution, multi-tier caching, partitioning strategies, and cloud database optimization. Handles complex query analysis, migration strategies, and performance monitoring. Use PROACTIVELY for database optimization, performance issues, or scalability challenges.

commands.name: Migration Observability and Real Time Monitoring
commands.description: Migration monitoring, CDC, and observability infrastructure

commands.name: SQL Database Migration Strategy and Implementation
commands.description: SQL database migrations with zero-downtime strategies for PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server
